00041 class SimpleResidueTermination
00042 {
00043  public:
00052   SimpleResidueTermination(const double minResidue = 1e-10,
00053                            const size_t maxIterations = 10000)
00054       : minResidue(minResidue), maxIterations(maxIterations) { }
00055 
00061   template<typename MatType>
00062   void Initialize(const MatType& V)
00063   {
00064     // Initialize the things we keep track of.
00065     residue = DBL_MAX;
00066     iteration = 1;
00067     nm = V.n_rows * V.n_cols;
00068     // Remove history.
00069     normOld = 0;
00070   }
00071 
00078   bool IsConverged(arma::mat& W, arma::mat& H)
00079   {
00080     // Calculate the norm and compute the residue
00081     const double norm = arma::norm(W * H, "fro");
00082     residue = fabs(normOld - norm) / normOld;
00083 
00084     // Store the norm.
00085     normOld = norm;
00086 
00087     // Increment iteration count
00088     iteration++;
00089 
00090     // Check if termination criterion is met.
00091     return (residue < minResidue || iteration > maxIterations);
00092   }
00093 
00095   const double& Index() const { return residue; }
00096 
00098   const size_t& Iteration() const { return iteration; }
00099 
00101   const size_t& MaxIterations() const { return maxIterations; }
00102   size_t& MaxIterations() { return maxIterations; }
00103 
00105   const double& MinResidue() const { return minResidue; }
00106   double& MinResidue() { return minResidue; }
00107 
00108 public:
00110   double minResidue;
00112   size_t maxIterations;
00113 
00115   double residue;
00117   size_t iteration;
00119   double normOld;
00120 
00121   size_t nm;
00122 }; // class SimpleResidueTermination
